definitions.definition: An idiosyncrasy ; a slight glitch , a mannerism ; something unusual about the manner or style of something or someone.
examples: The car steers cleanly, but the gearshift has a few quirks .

definitions.definition: An acute angle dividing a molding ; a groove that runs lengthwise between the upper part of a molding and a soffit .

main_definition: An idiosyncrasy ; a slight glitch , a mannerism ; something unusual about the manner or style of something or someone.
secondary_definitions: ( architecture ) An acute angle dividing a molding ; a groove that runs lengthwise between the upper part of a molding and a soffit .
( archaic ) A quibble , evasion , or subterfuge .
